    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L1
    [var]                                   1         4
    [stringInStringUnicode]                 5         26
    [=]                                     27        28
    ["${"âˆ†"}"]                              29        37
L2
    [var]                                   1         4
    [stringInStringNewline]                 5         26
    [=]                                     27        28
    ["${"\\n"}"]                            29        38
L3
    [var]                                   1         4
    [nestedInterpolation]                   5         24
    [=]                                     25        26
    ["${"${"\\n"}"}"]                       27        41
L4
    [var]                                   1         4
    [interpolationWithMethodCall]           5         32
    [=]                                     33        34
    ["${foo("")}"]                          35        47
EOF
